name: jojen
description: Expressive validator for Node and the browser, with a small footprint and awesome performance

scripts.debug: node debug mocha -r test/_setup.js --compilers js:babel-register && eslint lib
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:lint
scripts.bundle: browserify lib/index.js -t babelify --presets es2015 -s Jo | ccjs --compilation_level=ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS > jojen.min.js
scripts.prepublish: babel lib --out-dir dist && npm run bundle

author: Connor Peet <connor@peet.io>
